maproulette - a Python client for the MapRoulette API¶

Contents:

  • Getting Started
  • Functionality
    • Module: api
    • Module: configuration
    • Module: maproulette_server

This client makes it easy for users to communicate with the MapRoulette API from within their Python environment.

Sample Usage:
>>> import maproulette
>>> config = maproulette.Configuration()
>>> api = maproulette.Api(config)
>>> api.get_project_by_id(4719)
{'data': {'id': 4719, 'owner': 4785024, 'name': 'health_facilities_in_india',...}
